title: What is this font on this Kodak packaging?
content:
Hi there

I am looking for specific 50's fonts and wondered what his font is on this Kodak packaging?  
Anyone?

Thanks!  
Og

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [kodaktype.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418214645/http:/typophile.com/files/kodaktype.jpg) | 138.34 KB |
author: Og

comments.content: Looks like Gotham Rounded but that is not old enough.
Thanks, maybe it is a package from the 60's, could very well be

Thanks for the tips  
but these fonts don't seem to have the lower case versions as the packaging does  
any other options?

Thanks  
Og

Hi, just looking over the ID board. You could look at Trade Gothic Extended, it's not quite a match (looking at the cap E) – but possibly puts you closer?

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/extended-63882/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418214645/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/extended-63882/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/extended-63882/")

Chris
